data.title: University of Lynchburg
data.meta_description: University of Lynchburg is a nationally recognized private university where students gain a greater heart for humanity and a mindset of individual growth. Here, thought-provoking learning ignites change in each individual, and the world.
data.text:
Home

Our Three Pillars

Our strategic plan puts a spotlight on the student experience emphasizing our three core pillars.

Leadership Development

The most powerful kind of leadership comes when we serve others.

Innovation and Collaboration

Innovation happens when we all come together.

Diversity, Equity, Inclusion, and Belonging

Together, we are reimagining our future.

Academic Programs

Learning is an adventure. At Lynchburg, unconventional courses and unique locations will help you find your passion. Our academics let you explore virtually any field you're interested in.

Featured Major

Environmental Sciences and Sustainability Major

Environmental sciences and sustainability majors learn to clearly identify and articulate evironmental challenges so that individuals and governments can take action.

Check out all of our majors and minors.

Featured Graduate Program

Master of Education in School Counseling (MEd)

This program prepares you to become a highly skilled school counselor who will meet the Virginia Department of Education's K-12 requirements.

Explore our graduate programs.

Everyone has a story.

No two stories are the same, but they have one thing in common: Lynchburg students, faculty, and graduates are changing the world — through service, leadership, and innovation.

Uncategorized

Uncategorized

Uncategorized

What’s new?

English professor’s YA novel selected for Center for the Book’s ‘Great Reads for Great Places’

“Robin and Her Misfits,” a young adult novel by Dr. Kelly Ann Jacobson, assistant professor of English at the University of Lynchburg, has been named Virginia’s 2024 “Young Readers” selection for “Great Reads for Great Places.”

Read more news.

Instagram

Stay in the know! Follow the University of Lynchburg on Instagram to keep track of campus events, student life, academics, and more. Don't miss out on what's happening at Lynchburg.
